Changelog
=========

1.2.0 (2019-04-05)
------------------

- Add a "like" button to the bottom of each page


1.1.1 (2018-12-14)
------------------

- Update default URL to https://docs.zeit.de


1.1.0 (2018-12-10)
------------------

- Use sphinx_elasticsearch for searching.


1.0.0 (2018-09-27)
------------------

- Initial release.
